Package com.cmput301.w19t06.theundesirablejackals.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptRejectLendActivity
    Allows use to accept of reject lend requests
    AddBookActivity
    This Activity adds books to a persons library.
    AlternateSignInActivity
    This login activity is used for testing purposes.
    BorrowRequestListActivity
    Pulls all Borrowed book requests and displays them here using recycler view
    ChatActivity  
    EditContactInfoActivity  
    EditOwnedBookActivity  
    LentListActivity
    List view of all current lent requests.
    MainHomeViewActivity  
    MapsActivity  
    MessagesActivity  
    NotificationActivity
    Handles the Notification list.
    OthersProfileActivity
    Activity used to display friends profile and give option to message and send friend request
    PersonalProfileActivity
    Displays personal profile of the current logged in user.
    ScanBarcodeActivity
    Allows user to scan ISBN code
    SelectLocationActivity  
    ShowBookOwnersActivity  
    SignInActivity
    Registers the user with a unique username and prompts then enter a contact number
    StartActivity
    The first activity upon launching the app.
    ViewAcceptedLendRequestActivity
    Displays an accepted book request to a book owner for scanning the barcode and indicate hand off.
    ViewBookRequestInfo  
    ViewBorrowedBookActivity
    Allows book borrowers to view a book they have borrowed, return the book, and view book owner's profile.
    ViewBorrowedBookRequestActivity
    When book is selected from Borrowed Book request when accepted of currently borrowed.
    ViewFriendRequestsActivity
    Allows user to view and accept/decline friend requests
    ViewFriendsListActivity
    List of friends to the user.
    ViewHandedoffBookRequestActivity
    Displays the requests information and a barcode scanner for the borrower to receive the book and indicate that the book is no borrowed
    ViewLibraryBookActivity
    A general book view of a book displayed on the library tab of the app.
    ViewOwnedBookActivity
    Allows the user to view an owned book and do certain action that only book owners can do.
    ViewPickupLocationActivity
    A google map activity used to view the pick up location of a book request
    ViewReturningLendRequestActivity
    Displays book requests to owner when the borrower scans a borrowed book for return.
